author: Bonnie and Peter Woods
method: Bring a large pan of water to the boil and add the new potatoes. Boil until tender Drain and crush them with the back of a fork. Stir in the butter and crème fraîche and season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Serve.
ingredients: 600g/1 lb 5oz new potatoes,  1 tbsp butter,  1 tbsp crème fraîche,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
